title: SettleWell – Newcomer Resource Hub
description: Built a mobile-friendly resource hub for newcomers to Canada navigating immigration, housing, healthcare, and more. Hit 1,500+ unique visits in 4 days with <25% bounce rate. Designed for clarity and ease of use with a clean UI and structured content.

title: Rufus Guitar Shop Redesign - FLUI Hackathon
description: 🏆 1st Prize at FLUI Hackathon'25 – Led user research, redesigning Rufus Guitar Shop’s e-commerce experience for better product discovery. Built high-fidelity prototypes with motion design for enhanced engagement.

title: Borrowhood - nwHACKS 2025
description: Borrowhood is a communal rental platform that allows users to list items for borrowing, exchange, or lending. Built for nwHACKS 2025

title: AI Tutor: CodeMentor AI
description: Developed a code learning platform using React.js, Python, Steamship, and Codex APIs, featuring code compilation and AI tutors.

title: Next Read: Book Recommender System
description: Developed a Book Recommender System, employing Python and Scikit-Learn's k-NN for precise item-based filtering, enhancing recommendation quality.
